mapper.select: SELECT ATCH_FILE_ID, FILE_SN, FILE_STRE_COURS , STRE_FILE_NM, ORIGNL_FILE_NM, FILE_EXTSN , FILE_CN, FILE_SIZE, FILE_MIME FROM ATCH_FILE_DETAIL WHERE ATCH_FILE_ID = #{atchFileId} AND FILE_SN = #{fileSn}

SELECT A.ATCH_FILE_ID A_ID , B.ATCH_FILE_ID B_ID , FILE_SN, FILE_STRE_COURS , STRE_FILE_NM, ORIGNL_FILE_NM, FILE_EXTSN , FILE_CN, FILE_SIZE, FILE_MIME , CREAT_DT, USE_AT FROM ATCH_FILE A LEFT OUTER JOIN ATCH_FILE_DETAIL B ON (A.ATCH_FILE_ID = B.ATCH_FILE_ID) WHERE A.ATCH_FILE_ID = #{atchFileId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ATCH_FILE_DETAIL WHERE ATCH_FILE_ID = #{atchFileId} AND FILE_SN = #{fileSn}
